About Wing Fong Restaurant Wing Fong Restaurant is a Fast Food restaurant located at 3801 Corunna Rd in Flint, MI . Wing Fong Restaurant has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, Chinese Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
